items.reviewContent: Amazing Product. good packing fast delivery and everything is perfect. I didn't wash clothes in the machine right now but it is all original and worth buying. size is really good and according to me must buy a big one in this price range. beautiful product cooperative seller. thanks Seller and Daraz.

replies.reviewContent: Dear Sonia, thank you for shopping with the official flagship store of Dawlance at daraz mall. We're glad that you shared your experience with us. It will help others to know about the products and our services.

items.reviewContent: Very nice packing, delivered quickly, washing machine size is very big, build quality is fine, we tried and washed clothes on the same day of receiving. Hope it will work better in future.

items.reviewContent:
same product is available in market at price tag of 82K. and I bought it at 94K during sale with discount.
I bought it from Flagship store. if Flagship store do such price manipulation then how can we trust Flagship store. 
I feel betrayed ,although machine looks good.

replies.reviewContent: Dear Customer, we would like to inform you that our items are fulfilled by daraz. It might be possible that product price was less when we inbounded it in daraz warehouse and now the price has increased so it is increased on daraz product page but the inventory has sticker of old price. You can cross check the price from our website. Please be sure that you have bought it in discounted price.

items.reviewContent: a Good product by dawlence for washing.very big drum with heavy motor. now no tension for washing  countless cloths. I have also washed blanket in machine.this machine saves expenses of dry clean

replies.reviewContent: Dear Abdal, it is an official flagship store and we would like to inform you that change of mind is not applicable on return as clearly return on the product page. Your return reason comment was, "haven't opened up the package yet. the size is too large need a shorter version of it that's why need to refund or exchange it". Unfortunately, we don't have an exchange policy on daraz. You are requested to contact us on chat before ordering if you have any confusion about our products.
